SEARCH
Package via.vinylsystem.Util

Class JsonUtils

java.lang.Object
via.vinylsystem.Util.JsonUtils
public class JsonUtils extends Object
Utility class for JSON operations and related helper methods.

Provides methods for parsing JSON strings into maps, converting maps to JSON, formatting numbers as 6-digit strings, safely reading lines from streams, writing JSON payloads, closing sockets/connections, and clamping TTL values.

All methods are static and can be called without creating an instance.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ghiyath invalid input: '&' sakariae

  • Constructor Details

    • JsonUtils

  • Method Details

    • tryParseJsonMap

      public static Map<String,String> tryParseJsonMap(String text)
      Attempts to parse a JSON string into a Map<String, String>.

      If parsing fails or the input is not valid JSON, returns null. All values in the returned map are converted to strings.

      Parameters:
      text - the JSON string to parse
      Returns:
      a map of key-value pairs, or null if parsing fails

    • toJson

      public static String toJson(Map<String,String> map)
      Converts a map of string key-value pairs into a JSON string.
      Parameters:
      map - the map to convert
      Returns:
      JSON representation of the map

    • format6

      public static String format6(long n)
      Formats a number as a zero-padded 6-digit string.
      Parameters:
      n - the number to format
      Returns:
      a string with exactly 6 digits, padded with leading zeros if necessary

    • readLineWithLimit

      public static String readLineWithLimit(BufferedReader reader, long maxLen)
      Reads a line from a BufferedReader and enforces a maximum length.

      Trims whitespace from the returned string. Returns null if the line is null or exceeds the specified maximum length.

      Parameters:
      reader - the BufferedReader to read from
      maxLen - the maximum allowed line length
      Returns:
      the trimmed line string, or null if it is too long or EOF

    • writeJsonLine

      public static void writeJsonLine(BufferedWriter writer, Map<String,?> payload) throws IOException
      Writes a map as a JSON line to a BufferedWriter and flushes the stream.
      Parameters:
      writer - the BufferedWriter to write to
      payload - the map to serialize as JSON
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • closeSocketCon

      public static void closeSocketCon(Closeable c)
      Safely closes a Closeable resource, such as a socket or stream.

      Ignores any IOException thrown during closing.

      Parameters:
      c - the resource to close, may be null

    • ttl6

      public static String ttl6(int ttlSec)
      Clamps a TTL value to a 6-digit string representation.

      Values are clamped to the range 0–999999 and returned as a zero-padded string.

      Parameters:
      ttlSec - the TTL value in seconds
      Returns:
      a zero-padded 6-digit string representing the TTL
